alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 1:47PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chesterfield County through 215 PM EDT... At 147 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chesterfield, or 12 miles west of Cheraw, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cheraw, Chesterfield, Cheraw Municipal Airport, Northeastern Technical College, Ruby, Mount Croghan, McFarlan, Chesterfield Ruby Middle School, Cheraw Fish Hatchery, and Chesterfield Detention Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
